Reviews.Title: Only records for 1/2-1 minute and video freezes!!!! DOESN'T WORK!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Buyer61970
Reviews.Content: Very unhappy with this purchase! Recording stops within a minute usually, different every time, but never recorded for more than 2 minutes!!
